results.content:
I just finished the this course, thank you Mr Alwai. 
Mr Alwai explains every idea every line of code in a clear understandable manner.
As a beginner to Flask, I learned a lot and I’m grateful.  I only have one suggestion though; it would be nice to add a ‘Database integration with Flask‘ lesson explaining how to save favorites movies alongside the Sessions feature included in the course.
results.content_html:
I just finished the this course, thank you Mr Alwai.
Mr Alwai explains every idea every line of code in a clear understandable manner.
As a beginner to Flask, I learned a lot and I’m grateful. I only have one suggestion though; it would be nice to add a ‘Database integration with Flask‘ lesson explaining how to save favorites movies alongside the Sessions feature included in the course.
